parameter.name: type
parameter.description: The event type either event or assignment. Default is event.

parameter.name: startDate
parameter.description: The event start date.Only return events since the startDate (inclusive). Defaults to today.

parameter.name: endDate
parameter.description: The event end date Only return events before the end_date (inclusive). Defaults to start_date.

parameter.name: undated
parameter.description: If true, only return undated events and ignore startDate and endDate.

parameter.name: allEvents
parameter.description: If true, all events are returned, ignoring start_date, end_date, and undated criteria.

parameter.name: contextCodes
parameter.description: List of comma separated context codes of courses/groups/users whose events you want to see.

parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: Number of results needs to be listed for a page.

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: The page number which need to be fetched.
